headline: Fiserv price target lowered to $266 from $268 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley lowered the firm’s price target on Fiserv (FI) to $266 from $268 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. Investors during recent discussions have skewed negative to cautious into the print as many think Clover volume acceleration will be challenging, though the firm is looking for the Q2 report to improve conviction in fiscal year targets, the analyst says in a preview. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try

headline: Fiserv (FI) Sold Off Due to Slowdown in Its Clover Payment Processing Unit’s Growth
